name: Ashantii of Galanthra
description:
The Queen's son has been kidnapped! She has called on Ashantii, a little elf warrior of Galanthra, to travel to the Evil Warlock's fortress to rescue her son from him. 

Slash through slimes as you explore the map, follow the path up to the Warlock's fortress and defeat him!

This is a top down  classic Zelda style 3D game, with the goal being to slash through as many enemy slimes as you can and defeat the final boss.
